page.title: 19MICKEYS(SOUTH MOOR SOC.CLUB)
page.content: Workingmens clubs are very popular in the Stanley area. Mickeys is situated on the outskirts of South Moor. The steward of the club has been there for twenty years. The opening hours are 11.30 am - 4 pm and 6.30 pm-10.30 pm. The beer is supplied by the Federation Brewery.They sell 3,000 pints each week. The clubs entertainment includes groups,bingo,discos,solo artists and a womens night Several people form the committee to manage the club.Their meetings are held each Sunday morning. A customer,Mr Hall said he spent 4 hours each Saturday and Thursday.He claims the drinks are expensive and not worth the money paid,the staff are not friendly and the entertainment is not very good.
